network

Class WrapperLink<T extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Link<T>
      • network.WrapperLink<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of message the link transmits.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputLink, OutputLink

    public abstract class WrapperLink<T extends Message>
extends Link<T>
    A Link that is used to wrap around another Link.

    This link implements Link.getSource() and Link.getSink() by calling on the wrapped link.

    Author:
    Bitidork
    See Also:
    Link

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WrapperLink(Link<T> link)
      Creates a link that wraps around the supplied link.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WrapperLink

        public WrapperLink(Link<T> link)
        Creates a link that wraps around the supplied link.
        Parameters:
        link - The link to wrap around.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if link is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the source or sink node are null
